extendedInfo.description: The hugely popular Solitaire Ultra, now available with high-tech, futuristic HD designs.â All-new HD Graphics optimized for Phones and Tablets ââ Achievements unlock new deck designs, deck backs, and tables ââ Global and National high score tables âSolitaire Ultra Tech features high-tech, high-resolution 3D graphics combined with exciting gameplay to bring the world's favourite game into the 21st Century. Choose from many different designs for the cards, the backs, and the table, to crate your perfect playing environment.And now, with Global and National High Score Tables, compete against the world for the highest score!Solitaire Ultra Tech is free, with ads. Solitaire, also known as Klondike or Patience, is the worldâs most popular solo card-game.âââ KNOWN ISSUES âââCurrently not working on the LG Optimus One.  We've blocked this device from downloading the app but somehow, they still are.  If you have an Optimus One, please don't 1-star us, as you have been warned it doesn't work!

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: Enjoyable time spent playing one of the best solitaire games available!  Amazing graphics in a cheap game!
reviews.author: Judith Jongewaard

reviews.title: \342\226\210 THE BEST YET \342\226\210
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried loads of other versions, most with more options, but this one is better due to faultless responsive controls, large easy to touch cards, simple slick graphics.    Would like to have a set of more traditional cards included in next update.  TOP job dev. Baffled why the standard version is VERY glitchy though.
reviews.author: Dan RC

reviews.comment: Nice interface but takes so long to win a game!  I bet I play twenty, maybe more, to win one.  For prizes, at least.
reviews.author: B Kallan

reviews.title: Doglovr4life
reviews.comment: I love this version of solitaire. The graphics are nice, the  card play smooth & the cards are easy to see. Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game...
reviews.comment: It is a fun game and I enjoy playing it. Only thing I\'m currently a bit confused by is the scoring, I just can\'t seem to figure it out. Just seems so random. IDK. Still a good app.  Thanks.
reviews.author: Jonathan Merritt

reviews.title: Overall good,  better than most.
reviews.comment: I need to go thru settings to see if it has an automatic flip mode. I dont like having to flip over each card. this is the first one that ive seen that doesn\'t flip the cards for u.even still one of the best ive tried so far (:
reviews.author: Monique Crader

reviews.title: Solitaire Ultra Tech
reviews.comment: Have this game on my last three phones cuz it\'s so addictive!!! Great UI n graphics. Put together very well with lots of items to unlock.  (*\302\257\357\270\266\302\257*) Please add more items to unlock to make this my #1 solitaire game...
reviews.author: Karen Shrang

reviews.comment: Gr8 game...best version of solitaire I\'ve played so far
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for two days and not once been able to actually play. Constantly crashes and I\'m forced to uninstall it. Not happy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best solitaire game by far
reviews.comment: Smooth, slick and beautiful. A pleasure to play and addictive.
reviews.author: Richard Motley

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: System upgrade for Samsung SII made me uninstall inoperable Solitaire Ultra and install this version.  Sharp graphics and Android Ice Cream Sandwich functionality make this a super option.  Kudos to the developers.  Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: To the virus-prone \'Jennifer\'
reviews.comment: There\'s not enough facepalms in the world for your inane stupidity and blatant lying. I wonder if you even understand what you said? This game does not, and has never had, any kind of \'virus\'.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Solitaire
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app on my Droid for several days and didn\'t win once. Not a sore loser but curious... Started counting cards and realized they never give you a full deck so winning isn\'t possible. They actually have new boards and backgrounds locked as if you could actually advance! Uninstalling. Minus 10 stars. But had to put one star to send comment.
reviews.author: Sara K

reviews.title: Worth paying for!
reviews.comment: Great job you made a great solitaire game not just another copy like everyone else\'s.  Would pay to have more modes though like spider.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitchy, but good.
reviews.comment: Became my favorite of all solitare card games. It IS glitchy, but plays great. Sometimes, depending on cards and backgrounds selected, it can be difficult to see. Has nice look and plays well, tho! Thanks devs!
reviews.author: Burt Donna

reviews.title: Hi-scores menu doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I can only see my scores. Otherwise, the game is perfect.  Xiaomi MI-2
reviews.author: M\303\241rk Szakm\303\241ry

reviews.title: Pretty good with annoyances
reviews.comment: Like scoring & gaining bonuses. Need more. Why deduct points moving A\'s at top? Touch sensitivity slow & inaccurate. Really dislike clock starting before you can move cards, lose 5 seconds at beginning!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Works perfect on Samsung Galaxy S2 running ICS.  Solitaire Ultra is my fave game and it just got even sexier... Futuristic graphics look great... 5 stars again! @Autie author... It\'s not only for tablets, it works perfectly on my phone and many others... Even low spec devices if you check the other reviews.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Regular solitary but u earn new decks and back grounds when u win no bs like some apps wont mess up ur phone
reviews.author: Michael Clausen

reviews.title: GREAT GAME
reviews.comment: works on my Asus tablet and my note 2  Super fun and the add is small -- i see it but it does not interfere with game play... I recommend this game!
reviews.author: Wendy Shields
